room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by Austin Panic Room in Austin
review: The Prison Break room was very challenging but fun! Lesly was a great operator. Definitely will be back!

room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by Austin Panic Room in Austin
review: Prison Break was definitely a challenge and had a very well thought through game and set up. Intense and on the edge at times pushed to the very limit of your time. Great use of your mind and puzzle solving capabilities. Would definitely recommend this room! A special thanks to our host Brian.

room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by Austin Panic Room in Austin
review: This was the perfect Father's Day gift! We had such a blast escaping from prison. Our extremely enthusiastic host Kyler made the experience worthwhile. I would definitely go back and attempt more rooms at this location.

room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by Austin Panic Room in Austin
review: Our first time. Our operator, Marilyn was great. The clues very tricky. We did the Prison Break and it was great. We finished with less than 9 minutes. Great in using your critical thinking skills.
